author: schor
msg: [UIMA-1834] added a new class, UimaVersion and UimaAsVersion, which is not in the source-path, and has substitutable values for the version (major, minor, incremental), and updated the pom to use filtered resource processing to produce a new class under target which has the version info from the pom substituted in.

author: schor
msg: [UIMA-1834] added a new class, UimaVersion and UimaAsVersion, which is not in the source-path, and has substitutable values for the version (major, minor, incremental), and updated the pom to use filtered resource processing to produce a new class under target which has the version info from the pom substituted in.

author: olegk
msg: Added HttpCache implementations that can be used to store cache entries requiring explict deallocation of system resources; cache entries can be generated using HttpCacheEntryFactory interface

author: cmpilato
msg: On the issue-2779-dev branch:  Add some testing framework changes, and
some new tests, for the automatic redirection stuff.
(validator_func): Check for the magic environment variable
which, if set to "yes", disables the URL and UUID validation that
Update httpd.conf snippet to show RedirectMatch statement.
